asset.hookText:
http://ngm.nationalgeographic.com/2013/03/night-gardens/newman-text

Taken over the course of two and a half hours, this time-lapse sequence of 55 still photographs reveals a spectacular evening show: The unfurling of a giant water lily at Pennsylvania's Longwood Gardens.
